verses.verse: וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi, came אַחֲרֵי֙ <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei And it came to pass after הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <S%H1697><s%> had-de-va-Rim these things הָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh, these וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer that [one] told לְיוֹסֵ֔ף <S%H3130><s%> le-yo-Sef, Joseph הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold אָבִ֖יךָ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi-cha Behold thy father חֹלֶ֑ה <S%H2470><s%> cho-Leh; [is] sick וַיִּקַּ֞ח <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Kach and he took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שְׁנֵ֤י <S%H8147><s%> she-Nei with him his two בָנָיו֙ <S%H1121><s%> va-Nav sons עִמּ֔וֹ <S%H5973><s%> im-Mo, with אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מְנַשֶּׁ֖ה <S%H4519><s%> me-nash-Sheh Manasseh וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et אֶפְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H669><s%> 'ef-Ra-yim. and Ephraim

וַיַּגֵּ֣ד <S%H5046><s%> vai-yag-Ged And [one] told לְיַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> le-ya-'a-Ko, Jacob וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and said הִנֵּ֛ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold בִּנְךָ֥ <S%H1121><s%> bin-Cha Behold thy son יוֹסֵ֖ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef Joseph בָּ֣א <S%H935><s%> ba cometh אֵלֶ֑יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha; about וַיִּתְחַזֵּק֙ <S%H2388><s%> vai-yit-chaz-Zek strengthened יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, unto thee and Israel וַיֵּ֖שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> vai-Ye-shev himself and sat עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- upon הַמִּטָּֽה׃ <S%H4296><s%> ham-mit-Tah. upon the bed

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יַעֲקֹב֙ <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko And Jacob אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יוֹסֵ֔ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef, unto Joseph אֵ֥ל <S%H410><s%> 'el God שַׁדַּ֛י <S%H7706><s%> shad-Dai Almighty נִרְאָֽה־ <S%H7200><s%> nir-'ah- appeared אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai to me בְּל֖וּז <S%H3870><s%> be-Luz unto me at Luz בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz in the land כְּנָ֑עַן <S%H3667><s%> ke-Na-'an; of Canaan וַיְבָ֖רֶךְ <S%H1288><s%> vay-Va-rech and blessed אֹתִֽי׃ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Ti.

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And said אֵלַ֗י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai, about הִנְנִ֤י <S%H2005><s%> hin-Ni behold מַפְרְךָ֙ <S%H6509><s%> maf-re-Cha unto me Behold I will make thee fruitful וְהִרְבִּיתִ֔ךָ <S%H7235><s%> ve-hir-bi-Ti-cha, and multiply וּנְתַתִּ֖יךָ <S%H5414><s%> u-ne-tat-Ti-cha thee and I will make לִקְהַ֣ל <S%H6951><s%> lik-Hal of thee a multitude עַמִּ֑ים <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mim; of people וְנָ֨תַתִּ֜י <S%H5414><s%> ve-Na-tat-Ti and will give אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאָ֧רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz this land הַזֹּ֛את <S%H2063><s%> haz-Zot likewise לְזַרְעֲךָ֥ <S%H2233><s%> le-zar-'a-Cha to thy seed אַחֲרֶ֖יךָ <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei-cha after thee אֲחֻזַּ֥ת <S%H272><s%> 'a-chuz-Zat possession עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam. [for] an everlasting

וְעַתָּ֡ה <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah Now שְׁנֵֽי־ <S%H8147><s%> she-nei- And now thy two בָנֶיךָ֩ <S%H1121><s%> va-nei-Cha sons הַנּוֹלָדִ֨ים <S%H3205><s%> han-no-la-Dim which were born לְךָ֜ le-Cha בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz unto thee in the land מִצְרַ֗יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim, of Egypt עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- before בֹּאִ֥י <S%H935><s%> bo-'I I came אֵלֶ֛יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha to you מִצְרַ֖יְמָה <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ray-mah unto thee into Egypt לִי־ li- הֵ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> Hem; are mine אֶפְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H669><s%> 'ef-Ra-yim Ephraim וּמְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <S%H4519><s%> u-me-nash-Sheh, and Manasseh כִּרְאוּבֵ֥ן <S%H7205><s%> kir-'u-Ven [are] mine as Reuben וְשִׁמְע֖וֹן <S%H8095><s%> ve-shim-'on and Simeon יִֽהְיוּ־ <S%H1961><s%> yih-yu- become לִֽי׃ Li.

וּמוֹלַדְתְּךָ֛ <S%H4138><s%> u-mo-lad-te-Cha And thy issue אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- that הוֹלַ֥דְתָּ <S%H3205><s%> ho-Lad-ta which thou begettest אַחֲרֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-rei-Hem after לְךָ֣ le-Cha יִהְי֑וּ <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yu; become עַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al after שֵׁ֧ם <S%H8034><s%> shem the name אֲחֵיהֶ֛ם <S%H251><s%> 'a-chei-Hem of their brethren יִקָּרְא֖וּ <S%H7121><s%> yik-ka-re-'U them shall be thine [and] shall be called בְּנַחֲלָתָֽם׃ <S%H5159><s%> be-na-cha-la-Tam. in their inheritance

וַאֲנִ֣י׀ <S%H589><s%> va-'a-Ni I בְּבֹאִ֣י <S%H935><s%> be-vo-'I And as for me when I came מִפַּדָּ֗ן <S%H6307><s%> mip-pad-Dan, from Padan מֵ֩תָה֩ <S%H4191><s%> me-tah died עָלַ֨י <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai to my sorrow רָחֵ֜ל <S%H7354><s%> ra-Chel Rachel בְּאֶ֤רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz by me in the land כְּנַ֙עַן֙ <S%H3667><s%> ke-Na-'an of Canaan בַּדֶּ֔רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> bad-De-rech, in the way בְּע֥וֹד <S%H5750><s%> be-'od when כִּבְרַת־ <S%H3530><s%> kiv-rat- yet [there was] but a little אֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz way לָבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> la-Vo to come אֶפְרָ֑תָה <S%H672><s%> 'ef-Ra-tah; unto Ephrath וָאֶקְבְּרֶ֤הָ <S%H6912><s%> va-'ek-be-Re-ha and I buried her שָּׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> sham her there בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> be-De-rech there in the way אֶפְרָ֔ת <S%H672><s%> 'ef-Rat, of Ephrath הִ֖וא <S%H1931><s%> hi he בֵּ֥ית beit לָֽחֶם׃ <S%H1035><s%> La-chem. the same [is] Bethlehem

וַיַּ֥רְא <S%H7200><s%> vai-Yar beheld יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El And Israel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei sons יוֹסֵ֑ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef; Joseph's וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and said מִי־ <S%H4310><s%> mi- Who אֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh. another

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יוֹסֵף֙ <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef And Joseph אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to his אָבִ֔יו <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv, unto his father בָּנַ֣י <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nai They [are] my sons הֵ֔ם <S%H1992><s%> Hem, like אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- whom נָֽתַן־ <S%H5414><s%> na-tan- hath given לִ֥י li אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him whom God בָּזֶ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> ba-Zeh; here וַיֹּאמַ֕ר <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-Mar me in this [place] And he said קָֽחֶם־ <S%H3947><s%> ka-chem- Bring them נָ֥א <S%H4994><s%> na please אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai about וַאֲבָרֲכֵֽם׃ <S%H1288><s%> va-'a-va-ra-Chem. I pray thee unto me and I will bless

וְעֵינֵ֤י <S%H5869><s%> ve-'ei-Nei Now the eyes יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel כָּבְד֣וּ <S%H3513><s%> ka-ve-Du were dim מִזֹּ֔קֶן <S%H2207><s%> miz-Zo-ken, for age לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo he יוּכַ֖ל <S%H3201><s%> yu-Chal [so that] he could לִרְא֑וֹת <S%H7200><s%> lir-'ot; not see וַיַּגֵּ֤שׁ <S%H5066><s%> vai-yag-Gesh And he brought them near אֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav, to him וַיִּשַּׁ֥ק <S%H5401><s%> vai-yish-Shak unto him and he kissed לָהֶ֖ם la-Hem וַיְחַבֵּ֥ק <S%H2263><s%> vay-chab-Bek them and embraced לָהֶֽם׃ la-Hem.

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El And Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יוֹסֵ֔ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef, unto Joseph רְאֹ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> re-'Oh to see פָנֶ֖יךָ <S%H6440><s%> fa-Nei-cha thy face לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo never פִלָּ֑לְתִּי <S%H6419><s%> fil-Lal-ti; I had not thought וְהִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh and behold הֶרְאָ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> her-'Ah hath shewed אֹתִ֛י <S%H853><s%> 'o-Ti אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him and lo God גַּ֥ם <S%H1571><s%> gam well אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- זַרְעֶֽךָ׃ <S%H2233><s%> zar-'E-cha. me also thy seed

וַיּוֹצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> vai-yo-Tze brought them out יוֹסֵ֛ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef And Joseph אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam מֵעִ֣ם <S%H5973><s%> me-'Im from between בִּרְכָּ֑יו <S%H1290><s%> bir-Kav; his knees וַיִּשְׁתַּ֥חוּ <S%H7812><s%> vai-yish-Ta-chu and he bowed לְאַפָּ֖יו <S%H639><s%> le-'ap-Pav himself with his face אָֽרְצָה׃ <S%H776><s%> 'A-re-tzah. to the earth

וַיִּקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Kach took יוֹסֵף֮ <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef And Joseph אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שְׁנֵיהֶם֒ <S%H8147><s%> she-nei-Hem them both אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֶפְרַ֤יִם <S%H669><s%> 'ef-Ra-yim Ephraim בִּֽימִינוֹ֙ <S%H3225><s%> bi-mi-No in his right hand מִשְּׂמֹ֣אל <S%H8040><s%> mis-se-Mol left hand יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, toward Israel's וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et מְנַשֶּׁ֥ה <S%H4519><s%> me-nash-Sheh and Manasseh בִשְׂמֹאל֖וֹ <S%H8040><s%> vis-mo-Lo in his left hand מִימִ֣ין <S%H3225><s%> mi-Min right hand יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; toward Israel's וַיַּגֵּ֖שׁ <S%H5066><s%> vai-yag-Gesh and brought [them] near אֵלָֽיו׃ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav. about

וַיִּשְׁלַח֩ <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-Lach stretched out יִשְׂרָאֵ֨ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El And Israel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְמִינ֜וֹ <S%H3225><s%> ye-mi-No his right hand וַיָּ֨שֶׁת <S%H7896><s%> vai-Ya-shet and laid עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on רֹ֤אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> rosh head אֶפְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H669><s%> 'ef-Ra-yim [it] upon Ephraim's וְה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hu who הַצָּעִ֔יר <S%H6810><s%> hatz-tza-'Ir, who [was] the younger וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et שְׂמֹאל֖וֹ <S%H8040><s%> se-mo-Lo and his left hand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and רֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> rosh head מְנַשֶּׁ֑ה <S%H4519><s%> me-nash-Sheh; upon Manasseh's שִׂכֵּל֙ <S%H7919><s%> sik-Kel wittingly אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יָדָ֔יו <S%H3027><s%> ya-Dav, his hands כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki although מְנַשֶּׁ֖ה <S%H4519><s%> me-nash-Sheh for Manasseh הַבְּכֽוֹר׃ <S%H1060><s%> hab-be-Chor. [was] the firstborn

וַיְבָ֥רֶךְ <S%H1288><s%> vay-Va-rech And he blessed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יוֹסֵ֖ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef Joseph וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-Mar; and said הָֽאֱלֹהִ֡ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him God אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whom הִתְהַלְּכ֨וּ <S%H1980><s%> hit-hal-le-Chu did walk אֲבֹתַ֤י <S%H1><s%> 'a-vo-Tai whom my fathers לְפָנָיו֙ <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nav before אַבְרָהָ֣ם <S%H85><s%> 'av-ra-Ham Abraham וְיִצְחָ֔ק <S%H3327><s%> ve-yitz-Chak, and Isaac הָֽאֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him the God הָרֹעֶ֣ה <S%H7462><s%> ha-ro-'Eh which fed אֹתִ֔י <S%H853><s%> 'o-Ti, מֵעוֹדִ֖י <S%H5750><s%> me-'o-Di me all my life long עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- against הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh. to this
